## Z scores

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 4)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_scores(x = x_vec)

y_vec = rnorm(40, 12, .3)

z_scores(y_vec)
```


```{r, error = TRUE}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  if(!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x needs to be numeric")
  }
  
  if(length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x should have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_scores(3)

z_scores("Roxy")

z_scores(y_vec)
```
